meanings.sent1: The extra batteries were suppletory for the remote control.
meanings.sent2: The additional notes were suppletory to the main presentation.
meanings.sent3: The backup umbrella was suppletory on the sunny day.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a suppletory ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The warm soup was a suppletory comfort on the cold evening.

meanings.definition: Serving to supply or compensate for a deficiency.
meanings.sent1: The emergency kit was suppletory during the power outage.
meanings.sent2: The extra staff members were suppletory for the busy season.
meanings.sent3: The spare tire was suppletory when the main one got a flat.
meanings.sent4: Her encouraging words were a suppletory boost to his confidence.
meanings.sent5: The kind gesture was a suppletory act of generosity.
